name: "Let My People Go" Quiz | Old Testament / Tanakh | 10 Questions

questions.text: Which of the following was NOT one of Jacob's sons?
questions.explanation:
Seth.

	Jacob's 12 sons were: Reuben, Simeon, Levi, Issachar, Asher, Dan, Zebulun, Gad, Judah, Benjamin, Naphtali, and Joseph.

Aaron.

	"Exodus 7:1: And the Lord said unto Moses, See, I have made thee a god to Pharaoh: and Aaron thy brother shall be thy prophet. " I put "biological brother" because tradition teaches that he was taken in by Ramses' family and considered Ramses to be his brother as well.

questions.text: Complete this verse "The LORD is my strength and song, and he is become my salvation: he is my God, and I will prepare him an habitation; my father's God, and I will exalt _________."
questions.explanation:
him.

	This verse can be found in Exodus 15:2.

questions.text: Exodus 15:20 says, "Then Miriam the prophetess, Aaron's sister, took a timbrel in her hand, and all the women followed her, with timbrel and dancing." What is a timbrel?
questions.explanation:
tambourine.

	In the NIV version it translates timbrel as tambourine. Timbrel was found in the KJV.

questions.text: Where did Moses receive the Ten Commandments?
questions.explanation:
Mt. Sinai

	Mt. Sinai is in Egypt.

questions.text: What is the seventh commandment, as numbered by Jews and most Protestants? (This quiz uses the King James version of the Bible)
questions.explanation:
Thou shalt not commit adultery.

	The Ten Commandments can be found in Exodus 20.

questions.text: According to Exodus 31:15, what shall happen if you work on the day of rest, that is the Sabbath?
questions.correct: You will be put to death
questions.explanation:
You will be put to death.

	Many people still choose not to work on the Sabbath, I being one of those, sometimes however it's not possible to not work on that day because things have changed since Moses received the Ten Commandments. This Commandment is often the forgotten one as many people now have to work on the Sabbath. All the Commandments, including this one, should be followed, but now people don't run the risk of being stoned to death if they work.

questions.text: Who is credited with writing the Bible's Book of Exodus?
questions.explanation:
Moses.

	Moses' brother Aaron talked for Moses because Moses had a bad stuttering problem.

questions.text: Who is the father of Bezaleel?
questions.explanation:
Uri.

	Exodus 38:22: "And Bezaleel the son Uri, the son of Hur, of the tribe of Judah, made all that the LORD commanded Moses."

questions.text: The last verse of Exodus is Exodus 40:38.  What is the last word in this verse in the King James Version?
questions.explanation:
journeys.

	Exodus 40:38 "For the cloud of the LORD was upon the tabernacle by day, and fire was on it by night, in the sight of all the house of Israel, throughout all their journeys."
